Bash(python3 -c "
import psycopg2

conn = psycopg2.connect\(''postgresql://eduresearch_db_user:R9vzABwmjFxq1Jlds18MFt5CO9X4tWwk@dpg-d5ghg68gjchc73etk1bg-a.oregon-postgres.render.com:5432/eduresearch_db''\)
cur = conn.cursor\(\)

# Check current status
cur.execute\(""SELECT id, email, name, is_superuser, is_active FROM users WHERE email = ''deschamps.jd@gmail.com''""\)
result = cur.fetchone\(\)
print\(''Before:'', result\)

# Update to superuser
cur.execute\(""UPDATE users SET is_superuser = true WHERE email = ''deschamps.jd@gmail.com''""\)
conn.commit\(\)

# Verify
cur.execute\(""SELECT id, email, name, is_superuser, is_active FROM users WHERE email = ''deschamps.jd@gmail.com''""\)
result = cur.fetchone\(\)
print\(''After:'', result\)

cur.close\(\)
conn.close\(\)
")
